name: Ojiv
description:
Tear sexy villain's clothes apart! Undress the anime girls with a rhythmic challenge. Win your fights while vibing to catchy music.

Use your quick reflexes and sense of rhythm to tap, hold, spam and swipe your way through each song, earning high scores and unlocking new characters and songs as you progress.

name: Chasing the Unseen
description: Climb massive creatures, explore otherworldly landscapes and find what you have been seeking.

name: Astro Duel 2
description: Astro Duel 2 is a sci-fi combat game combining top-down space dog fights with up-close platforming action. Whether versus or co-op, battle through space and on foot at the same time! Strike within the fully-destructible arenas or just nuke ‘em from orbit.

name: Taxi Life: A City Driving Simulator
description: Climb into the driver's seat of your car and your business, transport passengers across Barcelona and grow your company! Can you help relieve the transportation challenges of a city that never sleeps?

name: MetaDOS
description:
MetaDOS: The Next-Gen Metaverse Battle Royale game.
Inspired by Apex Legend and In-Time movie. MetaDOS develops the game focused on E-sport battle royale mode with time system (time is currency) and high-quality graphics.

name: Duelists of Eden
description: Build a deck and battle online in real-time action with rollback netcode!

name: Orrstead
description: Orrstead is a relaxing city builder that combines resource management and incremental game mechanics. Unlock technologies, complete quests, and adapt to the changing seasons.

name: A Twisted Tale
description:
Discover a humouristic point and click adventure inspired by all the masterpieces which made us stick to our computers back in the day (and therefore we played outside way too infrequently). Full of loony characters, unexpected twists and challenging riddles.
Accompany Vio on her unintentional journey through various realms. Explore broken cities, pirate ships in the deepest jungle and other unreal places. Stand by her side when she makes the acquaintance of the (depressive) Death and engage with lots of explicit and ambiguous references, hommages and imitations of the big classics past (and not quite past) times.

name: Time to Morp
description: Time to Morp is a colony sim game in which you take care of playful creatures - Morps. Use their skills to gather resources, build pipe networks, automate everything and explore the world to find new species and rare materials.

name: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley
description: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley is a musical adventure game in which Snufkin needs to restore the harmony of Moominvalley, after a series of grotesque parks has appeared and ruined the valley's natural balance. The game is an ambient and wholesome experience for both kids and adults, and combines open world-mechanics with puzzles, stealth and melodic elements.

name: Reigns of Samosbor
description: Try on the role of Head of the Bloc, one of the many settlements inside Gigakhrushchevka. Lead your Bloc through the horrors of Samosbor, conspiracies and lack of resources. Make the right decisions and try to survive!

name: Zoria: Age of Shattering
description: A squad-based tactical RPG with fluid turn-based combat, outpost, and follower management, set in the expansive Fantasy world of Zoria. Lead a team of four heroes with their unique skills and perks. Every team member contributes to undertaken battles.

name: Perfect Round Disc Golf
description: Perfect Round Disc Golf is a casual yet realistic interpretation of the sport of Disc Golf. Classic three click golf game play mechanics are easy to learn but hard to master, and will keep you searching for the perfect round.

name: Between the Stars
description:
Between the Stars is a space action game with RPG growth and real time combat that places you at the helm of an interstellar cruiser. Your mission will be to protect the civilized world from the Children of the Sun, a faction that dominates border planets in the known universe. In order to undertake your mission you must cross the galaxy, face new challenges at each warp jump, and make difficult decisions that affect your ship, crew and the world that surrounds you while upgrading your ship's equipment and fighting in battles to survive.

Fight in intense space battles in real time.
Use special abilities on your ship in the right moment to mark the difference on the battlefield.

Unlock, upgrade, personalize and buy different playable ships and their systems in order to conquer the galaxy.
Create a captain and develop them throughout the adventure. Level them up and acquire different attributes depending on your decisions.
Explore the stellar map and its events generated in a procedural universe.

Visit space stations and planets across different sectors that make up the galaxy.
Hire and upgrade your crew in order to face the dangers of the universe. Ensure their safety and cover your casualties, as well as level them up.

Hundreds of text based events that will pit your capacity as well as your crews against countless dangers.
Craft, salvage, and investigate new weaponry in order to augment your offensive capabilities.
Decisions made in one event could change the evolution of the entire playthrough.
Enjoy a standard difficulty mode or play with permadeath on for a challenge.

name: Potions: A Curious Tale
description: Potions: A Curious Tale is an adventure-crafting game where your wits are your greatest weapons and combat is not always the answer. Encounter fairy tale characters and stories from around the world as you play as Luna, a young witch who overcomes obstacles with the potions she brews.

name: Taylordle
description: Taylordle.xyz is a daily Taylor Swift song guessing game where players have 8 guesses to get the correct song."

name: Appetit
description: A mixed reality cooking assistant to improve your life in the kitchen!

name: Headspace XR
description: Headspace XR is a virtual playground where you can move, play, meditate, or just explore with your friends — all in breathtaking immersive environments. It’s XR, but you’ll feel the real life benefits of mood-boosting games, one-on-one guided meditations with your favorite Headspace teachers, and strengthening your mind-body connection through movement. No matter how you’re feeling, just drop in, take a deep breath, and make time for your best, most mindful self.

name: Chatty's Bratty Tryst
description: Chatty's Bratty Tryst (CBT) is a fan-made visual novel made in Ren'py centered around Lucy Pyre, the cringe femcel demon girl Chatty loves and adores.

name: Hotshot
description: Hot Shot, Book 1 is the first book of the Hot Shot series. It is followed by Hot Shot, Book 2.

name: AAA Clock: Extreme Premium
description: Sin descripción

name: Lexibook Batman Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console
description: Introducing the Lexibook Batman Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console, your gateway to a world of endless entertainment! With 150 exhilarating games at your fingertips, including 10 action-packed Batman adventures and 140 classic favorites spanning sports, logic, adventure, platforms, and more, this pocket-sized powerhouse guarantees hours of non-stop fun for everyone. Hunt menacing monsters, escape perilous zones, score incredible goals, and race to victory in wild competitions, all on the vibrant 2.5" LCD color screen that brings every game to life with stunning visuals. Our portable console isn't just about gaming; it's a complete sensory experience. Immerse yourself in the Batman universe with its captivating design, celebrating the Dark Knight and enhancing every gaming session. The built-in speaker and volume control allow you to enjoy the immersive soundscapes without disturbance, making this console the ultimate gaming companion for on-the-go adventures. The Lexibook Batman Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console isn't just a gaming device; it's a statement. Perfectly sized to accompany you wherever you roam, it fits effortlessly in your pocket or bag, ensuring that the excitement is always within reach. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a casual player, this console offers something for everyone, from adrenaline-pumping action to brain-teasing challenges. Experience the future of gaming with this battery-operated wonder, and elevate your leisure time to a whole new level. With Lexibook Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console, you're not just buying a toy; you're investing in unforgettable memories and endless entertainment. Don't miss your chance to own this unique piece of gaming history—grab yours now and embark on an epic adventure that will leave you craving for more!

name: Gibtropolis
description: A relatively complex, somewhat non-linear city map.

name: Bullet Hell Days
description: Sin descripción

name: Critical Failure
description: This is a simple wave-based zombie survival game. The world's first VIDEO GAME CONTROLLED LIVE ACTION SERIES. Be prepared to directly influence the world of CRITICAL FAILURE.

name: Hentai Witch
description: Swap puzzle pieces to complete levels and unlock more viewing modes.Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.

name: Turnabout in the Lighthouse of Lunacy
description:
Behold the unassailable facts of the case.

Aurelia Chase, a journalist, was caught snooping around in a place she wasn't supposed to be.

The resulting confrontation took an ugly turn.

Once witnesses arrived, they found her inside a locked room. Alongside a dead body.
Now, she stands accused of murder, and has to defend herself.

Will she be able to discover the truth?

Well... That won't be necessary. It would be counterproductive, in fact.
The truth of the matter has been clear from the start.
Because no matter what excuses Aurelia might make, she is guilty.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibugawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 14 - Rasen no Kan Satsujin Jiken
description: Two cases are intertwined in a spiral, Heading toward a sad truth.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2020 Audi TT RS Coupe
description: Forza Motorsport 2020 Audi TT RS Coupe

name: Fountain
description: Lead a squad of up to 7 members entering a constantly changing barrier. In this mysterious adventure, meet interesting companions, fight against various enemies, collect rare treasures, and reveal the secrets concealed within the barrier.

name: Piggy's Great Adventure
description: Let's have a great adventure with Piggy the Little Dragon! Gather a group of unique friends and fight against dark demons! Fantasy SRPG is here!

name: Sprout Valley: Lovely
description: Sin descripción

name: Trading Simulator
description: Trading Simulator is an exciting and educational game that immerses you in the world of financial markets, where you become a virtual trader.

name: Reveil: Funhouse Edition
description:
In addition to REVEIL, the Funhouse Edition contains the following DLCs:
- REVEIL Original Soundtrack: 14 original compositions, beautiful and haunting.
- Digital Artbook: A look behind the scenes of the game, featuring concept art and inspirations.
- Black and White Camera Filter: Use this in game for vintage horror atmosphere.
- Audio Plays: A selection of audio plays recorded with the game's voice actors, more bits and pieces from the world of REVEIL.
- Developer Commentary: Commentary by the developers to be found in-game, for even more background insights.

name: Victoria 3: Trains Bonus Pack
description: The power and potential of steam transportation is brought to new life for Victoria 3 in Trains Bonus Pack. This new free pack for Paradox Interactive's grand strategy society simulation is free for all players.

name: Idle Champions: Archmage Dhadius Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Dhadius (if you don't already have them) Archmage Dhadius Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Dhadius 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Dhadius Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Dark Urge Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion The Dark Urge (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Dark Urge Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for The Dark Urge 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold The Dark Urge Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Codename Attila
description: Codename Attila is a First TPS Shooter Survivors-like game. Defend yourself against hordes of enemies coming at you. Use all your skills and strategy to survive. Enhance your character to strengthen your power and enjoy the taste of this power against your enemies.

name: The Big Below
description: Take on the role of a little gnome exploring twisting, secret-filled dungeons in this retro, top-down adventure game.

name: Darkness Ritual: Impasse
description: You witnessed a dark ritual taking place and nothing will go wrong from now on. You are stuck in an unknown place, can getting out of here and solving the secrets save you from this impasse?

name: Hotdog Runner
description: You are Simon, a lover of hotdogs. Can you guide him to collect the most hotdogs EVER?

name: Mister 9
description: Look for irregularities in the house where the uncles live. Irregulars are the enemy. For the sake of world peace, shoot without mercy.

name: Cube Stack Ultimate
description: Cube Stack Ultimate is an incredible game of stacking cubes that provides endless enjoyment.

name: Rocket League: Season 14
description:
DIVE INTO A FRESH AQUADOME ARENA IN ROCKET LEAGUE SEASON 14 !

Rocket League Season 14 submerges players in aquatic ambience. Kick off in a new version of AquaDome and deck out your car in maritime items !

name: My Singing Monsters: Thumpies
description: Thump to the rhythm and bounce to the beat with these cute, fuzzy (and kinda gross) musical monsters! Full of toe-tapping mischief and off-beat melodies, Thumpies is a unique rhythm-based game where you keep the beat alive by tapping in time with Thumpies as they bounce and tumble to the musical score. The original inspiration for the hit mobile game My Singing Monsters, Thumpies is now remastered and re-imagined!

name: Deepwell
description: Deepwell is a story-driven adventure game, about a small town surrounding a giant mystery hole.

name: Hidden Cats In Breeze Village
description: Find cute cats in Breeze Village. Can you find them all? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Marie's Travel
description: "The Traveller: Maries" is a highly interactive search and puzzle development game.

name: Exit the Museum
description: Exit the museum is a game highly inspired by "Exit 8". You are the security guard of a museum and have to go through nine appearingly similar rooms. There is a ~30% chance of nothing beeing wrong in comparison to the first "Showroom".

name: Lobby 2
description: Play as Fallenshadow by taking on the form of 12 girls and access 70 perks to help you fight off your husbands.

name: Cubix
description: Cubix is an exciting game with challenging jumps and puzzles. Embark on an adventure where every step is taken with deliberation, and every level is filled with incredible challenges. Relive the thrill of this platformer!

name: Reveil: Funhouse Pack
description: The Funhouse Pack contains all DLC for REVEIL

name: Everloop
description: You are trapped in an endless hallway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach your destiny.

name: Pipe Escape
description: A 2D puzzle game with a spin! Make your way through obstacle courses of pipes, water streams and bats as fast as you can whilst spinning out of control.

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy
description: A bundle of the first three S.T.A.L.K.E.R. games released on consoles for the first time.

name: Hentai Puzzle: Clarise
description: Hentai Puzzle: Clarise Is A Relaxing Puzzle Game.

name: IdleCraft
description: An idle loot short game, with some clicks and a bit of luck, you can beat it.

name: Rage Quit Bundle
description: Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends Get ready to feel the pain! Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends is a punishing platforming game where you start in the deepest depths of Hell and must escape.

name: 100 March Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 March Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 100 March Cats
description: 100 March Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Lovely themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of romantic 8 march places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Where The Crows Roam
description: Where The Crows Roam is a survival horror game made by a 6th grader in his free time. In this game you will get to explore the now deserted Stunig City and its outer ruins. Watch your back because you never know what is watching you. Can you survive?

name: Kaii Judge Labyrinth
description: Sin descripción

name: Elevator Zero
description: Elevator Zero is a first-person exploration and puzzle game in which you have to progress by finding anomalies.

name: Gravity Pro
description: In this arcade game, use your paddle to strike the ball and shatter bricks. Gravity and physics are both your allies and challenges. Master skill and precision to navigate dynamic levels and get high scores. Every hit, every angle, and every rebound plays a crucial role in determining your success.

name: Cura
description: This game is a 3D puzzle game where you control the box-shaped character ``CURA'' to conquer stages and reach the goal.

name: All Elite Wresting: Fight Forever - Giant Swing in the Ring
description: All Elite Wrestling and Ring of Honor star Claudio Castagnoli joins the AEW: Fight Forever roster with his famous European Uppercut. The Giant Swing in the Ring DLC also features 30 re-skin options, as well as an alternate version of Claudio's entrance music.

name: Asurya's Embers
description: Asurya's Embers is a 1st-person, single-player, bow-and-arrow shooter set in an ancient Himalayan village plagued by an environmental disaster. Find safety in the shadows from the blazing heat waves as Dawa, a bow-wielding hero who protects her village from the vengeful sun god, Asurya.

name: Terrafort
description: A procedurally generated sandbox survival game with RTS elements.

name: Hospital 666
description:
A Single and Multi-player Horror Game.

You wake up in an endless hospital.
You can only use the front or rear elevator.

If you see something strange, turn back.
If you see something strange, turn back.
If you see something strange, turn back.

What will you find on floor 666?

name: Card Fencer
description: Journey through distant lands, collect cards to defeat your enemies, and discover other powerful treasures along the way in Card Fencer, a deck building turn-based RPG.

name: A Difficult Game About Climbing
description: This is a difficult game about climbing.

name: Witches Wishes and Whispers
description: Witches Wishes and Whispers is a "Einstein"-style elimination puzzle where you sort ingredients to make potions. Based on the card clues, you must pick the correct ingredients so all the clues remain true!

name: Inside The Crystal Mountain
description: Inside The Crystal Mountain is an action adventure game with frenetic combat and some roguelike elements where you explore a mysterious world filled with interesting characters and challenging enemies.

name: Stray Cat Doors 3
description: A stage by stage puzzle adventure with a cute girl with cat-ear hats adventuring in people's dreams.

name: Pancho's Mission
description: Embark on an epic journey alongside Pancho, the brave panda who has decided to save his world from the tyranny of the evil eagle and its loyal followers. Explore three unique locations — a mysterious forest, an unforgiving desert, and the eagle's cave — by completing 15 captivating levels in each.

name: LA Hollywood Zombies
description: Survive the horror of Anubis`s army of dead with Death the Reaper spawning the dead to destroy eat the living because of the sin greed by mankind design there hell!?

name: Square Edges
description: Mini arcade game about a cube jumping on moving platforms. All platforms move at different speeds. Find the right moment to make a precise jump so as not to fall off the edge. Collect tokens and gain a high rating to purchase other characters.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Peacemaker
description:
Christopher Smith, the Peacemaker, cherishes peace with all his heart. So much so, that he will kill anyone and everyone necessary to get it.

This pack includes playable character Peacemaker, based on DC's Suicide Squad, including all new movesets.

Peacemaker is a guest character based on John Cena's appearance as the character in The Suicide Squad movie and the Peacemaker television series.

name: Top Racer: Crossroads
description: A new game in the Top Racer series, being a collaboration with Horizon Chase.

name: Backrooms Rec.
description: Dive into the haunting Backrooms, where reality blurs and nightmares lurk. Survive, explore, and uncover dark secrets. Solo-developed, immersive, and coming soon to Steam Early Access. Shape the future. Adventure awaits!

name: Twin Stick Tennis
description: A new way to play digital tennis. Play by manually controlling your player and racket! With only yourself to blame, will you be able to master the ball? Train and dominate the court. Play epic matches against friends, or start a career and become the next big smack champion!

name: Paramnesia: Escape Together
description: A Cooperative Mystery Unfolds: In 1948, four investigators come together to find a missing priest, only to be trapped in a sinister space. Through teamwork, they uncover clues, echoes of their pasts, and mysterious notes signed in their names......

name: Ludus Mortis
description: Grid-Based First Person Dungeon Crawler set in a Dark Fantasy version of the Imperial Rome. Create and develop your party, explore catacombs and fight demons and undead to free Rome. Inspired by old-school cRPG from the 80s and 90s.

name: Zoonomaly
description: A zoo has been taken over by monsters and you have been tasked with entering this zoo, finding the cause of the monster infestation, and putting a stop to it. To accomplish this task, you must collect key shards that have been scattered throughout the zoo. To find the key shards, you must solve puzzles within the animal enclosures. Once all the shards are collected, you can assemble the master key to unlock the source of the monster anomalies.

name: Little Learning Machines
description: Explore the incredible power of reinforcement learning to inspire, train and customize adorably intelligent machines in this cozy life sim. Craft and inspire each Little Machine’s unique personality, then train them to do amazing things!

name: Winter Survival
description: Dive into the ultimate winter survival experience and see if you can survive long enough for rescue to arrive.

name: Puzzles For Clef
description: Puzzles for Clef is a relaxing adventure game focused on the eponymous heroine. Following a letter from her sister, Cres, our bunny friend Clef journeys to the island of her ancestors, to undertake a treasure hunt.. The journey will take her across a land of beauty, magic, and mystery, as she explores each of the island’s regions, solves its countless puzzles, unearths long-forgotten secrets, and rediscovers her family’s legacy.

name: Berserk Boy
description: Berserk Boy is a vibrant, retro-inspired 2D action platformer that lets you… GO BERSERK! Change into different forms and use the power of Lightning, Fire, Earth, Air, and Ice as you race through stylish stages in a heroic battle to save the planet from the evil Dr. Genos!

name: Hairdresser Simulator
description: Grab your scissors and delve into the world of hairstyles! Generate profit to further work on your craft and expand your salon. Improve your skills and become the best of the best!

name: Hex Gambit: Respawned
description: A quirky and competitive digital board game for 1-4 players. Easy to pick up, hard to put down! Matches take 20 minutes.

name: Reveil
description: Reveil is a narrative first-person psycho-thriller game that focuses on story, puzzles and exploration. Find out what’s going on inside Walter Thompson and what his dark past at the Nelson Bros Circus has to do with it.

name: Sonic.Nes
description: Sin descripción

name: Turnabout in the Spotlight
description: If you were suddenly thrust into the spotlight, would you shine or would you fizzle out?

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Twilight Town
description: Twilight Town is a small but dense map heavily inspired by Thief, Deus Ex, and Dishonored. Oldspider wanted to experiment with adding player agency and nonlinear level design.

name: 2 Hours to Kill!
description: 2 Hours to Kill is a Doom II community speedmapping session in MBF21 format with a focus on refined combat. This set is split into 2 episodes depending on the kind of action: traditional Doom gameplay or slaughter.

name: Haven: The Leader
description: Sin descripción

name: College Sex: Episode 9
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they head to the library with the intention of studying, only to find themselves distracted.

name: Prostitute Pimp
description: In Prostitute Pimp you will play the role of a whore pimp who runs a prostitute club. You will have to get new customers by hiring new girls on the street and improving your club.

name: Street Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful art. Reveal beautiful pictures under the card with a cute girl.

name: Stories to Tell: Downhill Cemetery
description: In "Stories to tell - Downhill Cemetery" you are a young Japanese man named Hiroshi who decided to move to a new house, he did not know what awaited him...

name: YuMayhem
description: YuMayhem (夢異変) is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Cortex Chronicles 6: The Infiltration of Nyx Sterling
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bomb Disarmament Expert
description: You're the one and only Bomb Disarmament Expert and you've been tasked with disarming a ticking bomb that's right in front of you, so don't panic. You might just blow up if you do!

name: Permaban

We went too far.

Twelfth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - The Great Don 71
description: Take a ride aboard your trusty Don 71 with an exclusive dinosaur-themed paint job.

name: Maze of Realities: Symphony of Invention DLC
description: Who says you can't have another otherworldly, literally, adventure? You and your friend have been invited to visit the world of Innovatix! Go on an adventure soon!

name: Classified: France '44 - Season Pass
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Classified: France '44 - Resistance Kit
description:
Get a heads start against the enemy with the Resistance Kit.
The Resistance Kit contains:

“Shadow” pattern weapons pack:
M1 Carbine “Shadow”
Lee Enfield “Shadow”
Trench Gun “Shadow”

“Ghost” pattern resistance clothing:
Resistance Hat “Ghost”
Resistance Jacket “Ghost”
Resistance Trousers “Ghost”

name: Classified: France '44 - Guerrilla
description:
Expand your arsenal and take the fight to the enemy with new Spec Ops missions and a brand new map in the Guerrilla Pack.

The Guerrilla Pack contains:
New Map – “Church”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Tomb Raiders
• Time to Kill
Two new weapon variants
• Bren “Ambush”
• Thompson “Boa”
New Clothing Set
• Female Resistance “Guerrilla”

name: Big Klondike: FreeCell Solitaire
description: Support Big Klondike and unlock FreeCell Solitaire.

name: Hues: Moon Sea
description: 40 more levels with water and buoyancy!

name: Spellbound FPS
description: First person shooter game based on the first part of the Spellbound series of books. You play as Damitri with his ability to use ice magic. The player will use snowballs and icicles to defeat enemies. They will use Laura's song or scream to heal yourself or hurt foes. 14 stages 4 bosses and 3 modes.

name: TESD: Into the Vortex
description: After performing a mock-ritual during the 2017 Halloween podcast, Baron Von Flanagan unknowingly unleashed a power long since sealed and thrust all of TESD Town into another dimension. Take control of Bry, Walt, and Q as they venture into the vortex in an attempt to save all of TESD Town!

name: The Showdown Effect: Reloaded
description: Experience fast-paced over-the-top multiplayer action in The Showdown Effect: Reloaded. Join players from around the world to engage in high-octane battles filled with bullets, explosions, and one-liners!

name: DNA: Episode 3
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Sector Yama
description: Sci-fi survivors game with a story campaign. Play as a space soldier, abandoned by the command on an alien planet. Find allies, gather resources, train new troops, and escape from Sector Yama. Casual "single-stick shooter" controls, fun tactical combat, rewarding exploration, and rich storytelling.

name: Search All: Dogs
description: This is a game in the "search for objects" genre, in which you need to find all the dogs in a large location. The dogs will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to barely noticeable places

name: Platformer
description: Explore a new world, traverse randomly generated landscapes, fight monsters, dig for materials, craft equipment, find treasure and trinkets to increase your strength, build a house to protect yourself at night, dig deep to find greater challenges, unique weapons, and more!

name: Strategic Mind: Fight for Freedom & Spirit of Liberty - Independence Bundle
description: Fight for the Independence - Strategic Mind: Fight for Freedom & Spirit of Liberty

name: Classified: France '44 - Deluxe Edition
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: The Outlast Trials: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the mind-numbing horror of Outlast, this time with friends.

name: Solo Flight
description: Save your town in this action-packed, shoot-em-up, flight simulation game after a giant, alien worm rudely attempted to remove your civilization from existence. Start your engine, pilot and welcome to Solo Flight!

name: Night Vigil
description: Come and hunt the monsters of the night! Destroy waves of monsters and welcome the dawn of victory!

name: LiveMeat
description: This is a first person single player horror adventure game. You need to sneak or run in the scene to avoid monsters, search for resources to survive, and find a way to leave.

name: Area 19
description: First Person Sci Fi Horror Game. Set within a confidential Underground Facility, Navigate through this Abandoned Complex, Discover Government Experiments, Alien Beings, and the haunting aftermath of the Roswell Crash.

name: Color Splash: Predators
description: Color Splash: Predators is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable predators and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful predators paintings.

name: Community Ball
description: This is a indie runner game based on geometry dash, in the game are 7 levels, Feel good, Firefly, My heart and more. The most of the levels have ncs songs so if you are a youtuber you wont have any probrem wirh the songs. In the game you have to collect coins in all levels.

name: CastingPlz
description: CastingPlz is a 2-player cooperative roguelike game where players take on the roles of two characters with distinct responsibilities: one for attacking and the other for movement.

name: Maze of Realities: Symphony of Invention Collector's Edition
description: Who says you can't have another otherworldly, literally, adventure? You and your friend have been invited to visit the world of Innovatix! Go on an adventure soon!

name: Waven: Drhell's Bells Pack
description: Check out the Drhell's Bells Pack, a thrilling special offer combining an adorable Drheller pet and 300 Gems - just perfect to start or continue your adventure in style!

name: The Outlast Trials: Reagent Starter Pack
description: Get ready with the Reagent Starter Pack, which includes exclusive items.

name: Face Of The Killer
description:
All the dogs are laughing - there is talk of a new play.
As fireworks burst over XX City, BB finds herself staring into the face of the Killer.

name: WWE 2K24: Season Pass
description: Expand your WWE Universe with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass, featuring 5 post-launch DLC character packs. Additionally, get access at launch to the MyRISE Mega-Boost which includes an additional 200 Attribute Points, and SuperCharger that unlocks all base game WWE legends and throwback arenas.

name: Dabman: When The Haters Dab Back Remastered
description: Relive this 2018 classic from Kimulator's Films in a remaster of one of their first game ever!

name: Egg RTX
description: Experience one of the games of all time like never before with Egg RTX. Fully remastered for next gen performance, Egg RTX includes raytracing and advanced shadows, never before seen in a game about eggs!

name: Time Escape: A Prototype
description: A side-scrolling obstacle jumping game including Twitch integration and achievements.

name: X Defense: Timing TD
description: Strategy, timing and fortune: Novel and immersive tower defense game experience!

name: Hidden Clues
description: Crack the cases! The murders are escalating in the city! Follow the clues to crack the cases and arrest the killers!

name: Legend Of Apophyxis
description: Embark on an epic journey filled with mystical enemies and powerful allies in this action-packed game. Harness your strength, defeat foes, and rise as the true hero of Myrr

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Waterfalls 2
description: Puzzles of Waterfalls!

name: Horst: Der Ultimatives Rollenspiel
description: This game is one but a bad way to learn german.

name: WWE 2K24 Forty Years of WrestleMania
description: WrestleMania is the biggest event in sports entertainment, where Superstars become WWE Legends. Experience a gripping retelling of WrestleMania’s greatest moments in 2K Showcase of the Immortals, where you can relive a collection of some of the most unforgettable, career-defining matches.

name: WWE 2K24 Deluxe Edition
description: Grow your MyFACTION card collection with the WWE 2K24 Deluxe Edition, including the Deluxe Edition Bonus Pack, Nightmare Family Pack with MyFACTION content, and the Season Pass!

name: Ash and Tor: Yuma's Quest
description: Explore the dungeons and try to find and save the Queen Yuma... but wait: it's almost an impossible dungeon. And why? Because it's easy to say: you must move two knights at once!!! Are you ready to find and save tons of girls without dying?

name: Magical Lands
description: This is a real-time strategy game where you control soldiers to protect an ancient obelisk from the forces of evil. Call on soldiers for protection. Try to manage your resources correctly!

name: Go Bananas
description: Go Bananas is a fast paced arcade platformer! Play as Blue the monkey and collect as many bananas as you can before the timer runs out! Over 100 banana filled levels to explore, jump, dash and drop your way through on Blue's quest to be a banana billionaire!

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game
description: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Classified: France '44
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Athena Crisis
description: Athena Crisis is a modern retro turn-based strategy game inspired by Advance Wars. Athena Crisis places you in command of distinct units including infantry, tanks, and air forces in your journey across multiple worlds. Embark on a challenging single-player quest or dive into the thrill of ranked or casual multiplayer modes.

name: Dreamio: AI-Powered Adventures
description: Dreamio: AI-Powered Adventures is a "choose your own adventure" game where content gets generated by AI on the fly. Story gets generated by ChatGPT, illustrations get generated by Stable Diffusion, and it uses speech synthesis for narration.

name: AnimalKingdom: Cats
description: Have fun with our cats.

name: FloraMancer: Seeds and Spells
description:
Floramancer: Seeds & Spells is an action/farming game where you grow spells and use them to fight and explore a magical procedurally generated forest.
Grow spells! Fight robots! Save your forest from deforestation.

name: Quilts and Cats of Calico
description: Quilts & Cats of Calico is a wholesome, award-winning complex puzzle game for 1 to 4 players. Meet adorable cats and sew the coziest quilts. Compete with other players in multiplayer mode, play solo, or delve into the story of a quilter sewing their way through the city of cats.

name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition
description: He's a plumber, she's a daddy's girl. Only you can get them together, or tear them apart! Plumbers have everything: Greed, sex, spirituality, white-knuckle chases, shameful propositions, a nun, humor, true love, jaded love, jealousy, taut action, comedy, a bad guy, a good guy, a hero, spine-tingling suspense, a hot babe, brazen bravado, a damsel in distress, and a Hollywood ending! Plays like a game... feels like a movie!

name: Unbearable
description: A story inspired by old school survival horror. Play alone or together on split screen. Delve into dark environments; hide or run; fight melee or with guns; climb and solve puzzles to discover the story of Unbearable.

name: Kingdom: The Blood
description: Kingdom: The Blood is an action game based on a popular TV series. Fight through intense battles and reach your goal in zombie-infested Joseon. See the beauty of Korea as you overcome challenges, and work together with your friends to defeat overwhelming bosses with diverse attack patterns.

name: Beneath the Mountain
description: In Beneath the Mountain, you play as the King of a new Dwarven civilization seeking to find their fortune beneath the mountain. You dig your way through the mountain, encountering many dangerous foes along the way, all while defending your kingdom from periodic Orc invasions.

name: KeepUp Survival
description: Welcome to a world of survival on a deserted island, characterized by an incredible wildlife and abandoned structures. Immerse yourself in a game set in a natural and post-apocalyptic environment where your primary task is to survive in KeepUp Survival.

name: Disco Simulator
description: Disco Simulator is a game where you play the role of the owner and manager of a music club. Buy equipment, sound system, lighting and decide on the appearance of your club. Make money on party people and have fun with them!

name: The Outlast Trials
description: The Outlast Trials is a survival horror game you can play by yourself or with other players online. You'll have to survive the twisted, sadistic and bizarre experiments of the Murkoff Corporation, alone or in a group up to 4 players.

name: The Thaumaturge: Deluxe Edition
description:
Step onto the culturally flourishing streets of Warsaw with an even more fashionable style in The Thaumaturge Digital Deluxe Edition.

To refine your look just as a gentleman should, you receive in-game content: an elegantly stylized hairstyle and facial hair, luxury clothes, and a HUD reskin.

But that's not all; the Deluxe Edition also includes downloadable content:
• Notes from the Grimoire to help you delve into the arcana of thaumaturgy
• A map of Warsaw in 1905 to familiarize yourself with the city
• The Thaumaturge digital soundtrack for your auditory pleasure
• A 3D printable model of the Golem salutor to guard your desk
• A set of wallpapers for an overall aesthetic boost

name: Silver Falls Mini: Monsters In North Island
description:
A thrilling new horror game has launched for the Pokémon Mini console! As part of the Nintendo exclusive Silver Falls horror series, you can now take your adventure with you on the go, anywhere, anytime!

In Silver Falls MINI, manage a team of people just trying to get by with their lives. But watch out! Monsters have appeared on North Island. It is up to Wilma, a wise hunter, Bull, a burly lumberjack, Gold, a friend carpenter, Hogan, a lively electrician, and Oxa, a starry eyed dreamer, to defeat the monsters and make North Island safe again.

Manage your party members' stats by directing party members to do jobs. Look out! If they are in bad shape, they may fail. If they are happy and well fed, they'll do better at their jobs and even find useful items for battle!

name: Kur Tu Teci, Gailīti Manu?
description: "Kur tu teci, Gailīti manu?" is a Latvian folk song about a rooster and his daily duties. As a game it is a simple parkour platformer.

name: Kur, Pelīte, Tu Tecēji?
description: "Kur, pelīte, tu tecēji?" is a Latvian folk song about a little mouse and it's mischiefs.

name: Sky Roller Coaster
description: Prepare yourself for a heart-pounding adventure like no other in the exhilarating Sky Roller Coaster game!

name: Stunts above Clouds 2
description: Your mission remains unchanged, but the stakes are higher and the challenges more intense.

name: Hey! Here Are Some Letters
description: A word based action-puzzle game.

name: The Gauntlet
description: The Gauntlet is a fast-paced movement driven game where you must survive a series of trials to claim the prize, your freedom. Bad Bat's brutal Game-Show has got a new contestant, lets hope they live to see the re-runs.

name: Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2
description: Experience the adrenaline rush of emergency response in Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2.

name: Animals vs. Animals
description: Let the race begin!

name: A Witch in Time: Yamada-kun to Nananin no Majo
description: At Suzaku High School, there has been generation after generation of witches that hold special powers. Ryu Yamada holds the special power to copy a witch's power and he's been using this to solve the many issues that pop-up at the school. One day, Ryu and his friends are hanging out at the Occult Club as usual. But when Miyabi brings up a rumor involving time travel, Ryu brushes it off as being unrelated to witches and their powers. On the way home from school, just outside the gates, Ryu feels someone tap on his shoulder. He turns around, but there's nobody there. Thinking it must have been his imagination, he continues on his way home only to find his house is gone! It turns out, he's travelled in time!

name: Red Magic
description: This is a unique puzzle game, once played, you will definitely be impressed and fall in love with this game.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Will
description: Sixty basic cores, hundreds of base station equipment, and thousands of chips, you can freely cooperate and shoot through the dual-angle joystick operation in a survival Roguelike game! Explore the sci-fi space and build your strongest battleship!

name: Speed Plumber
description: Sin descripción

name: Cavemount
description:
We decided to take a break from all those block-pushing games and make a hack'n'slash game instead.

Hold on for a bit, our programmer is trying to say something urgent

Eleventh in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: The Red Button
description: Resist the urge to press the button and do not uncover the secrets that may lie within its crimson facade. The choice is yours: to press or not to press.

name: Endless Ocean
description: This is a flying shooting game with a super cool red fighter appearance

name: Andarin Weppes: Pre-Dementia
description: Andarin Weppes is a first person puzzle experience of a man with ever advancing dementia...

name: Color Hunt: Number Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Number Grid Coloring Puzzle Game! Color Hunt is a fun and relaxing puzzle game. It's more than just coloring- it's a randomly generated number block jigsaw game that'll take your brain to another level!

name: ReThink 3.5
description: ReThink 3.5 is a previously unreleased Puzzle Game rebuilt in Unreal engine 5, in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Fox Trot
description: Embark on a wild journey in Fox Trot! Play as a nimble fox, collecting coins amidst a dynamic forest. Evade obstacles, unlock skins, and seize daily rewards for endless, thrilling fun. Download now and let the running begin!

name: Arena Survivors
description: Arena Survivors - A bullet hell game about visiting interesting places and destroying everything in sight.

name: Drunken Superhero
description: Sin descripción

name: Cracking the Stone
description: Enter the life of a boy experiencing tragedy for the first time, the burden of his parents' hopes & dreams, and the struggle to let his emotions in. Deflect the negative emotions coming from outside forces while trying to juggle the ins and outs of childhood, puberty, and relationships.

name: FMV Action
description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you Bloodshore and Mia and the Dragon Princess all discounted in one bundle!

name: FMV Murder Mystery Bundle
description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you The Shapeshifting Detective and The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, all discounted in one bundle!

name: FMV Detective
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer their very best FMV Detective games! Featuring The Isle Tide Hotel, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? and The Shapeshifting Detective all in one bundle!

name: The FMV Collection 4
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the Bloodshore, I Saw Black Clouds and Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? all in one bundle!

name: Greyish White
description: This is a casual parkour game.

name: Crusader Kings III: Legends of the Dead
description: What good are grand accomplishments and heroic deeds if no one sings of them after you have gone? A royal legacy is only useful, after all, if it can provide cover and legitimacy for those who come after you. Live on in the memory of your subjects and rivals in Legends of the Dead.

name: DrawBall
description: DrawBall is a fun puzzle game where the aim of the game is to complete levels by drawing ink to guide coloured balls into a correctly coloured hole. DrawBall includes over 30 in built levels and a level editor so you can create and export your own levels and even import levels made by others!

name: The Contact
description:
The Contact is a first-person horror game.
You have to look for something mysterious by relying on the phone number and location information found on the internet.

name: We are Football 2024
description:
Welcome to We Are Foorball 2024 – the new football management experience from the creators of the legendary On the Ball and EA Sports FIFA Manager Series! Dive into the world of football like never before. Choose an existing club or start your own. Manage either men or women, lead your club to new heights, and become the following manager legend!

Be there with your team on the pitch. In our immersive 3D game engine, you can directly influence the action on the pitch through instructional shouts. Simulate the same game a thousand times over, witness matches 50 years into the future or switch between games in conference mode on match day. Relive highlights, analyze goals, and enjoy a comprehensive season summary.

name: Alian
description: This is a normal shooting game. There is nothing extra in it.

name: Afterworld
description: Join the realm of Afterworld. Save animals, help spirits, and stop the destruction of the realm.

name: 3-byou Banana
description: This is Banana!

name: VaporAeon
description: Serve, spike, and customize in this 2D Vaporwave Volleyball game! Experience '80s-inspired arcade fun with friends or AI. Precision platforming, colorful visuals, and multiplayer mayhem await. Are you ready for this neon sports adventure?

name: Vertical Velocity
description: Vertical Velocity forces the player to use precise movements to navigate obstacles and courses as the sun. Your goal is to defeat the moon and take your place back in the sky.

name: Verzeus
description: Blast and weave your way through enemy fire while managing a wide variety of ship power-ups in this retro style horizontal shoot-'em-up!

name: Chess Soul
description: Type: [Card] [Aircraft Battle] [Growth]A game where players operate airplanes to pass levels, gradually improving their abilities and challenging themselves with higher levels of transformation.

name: With in the Obscurity
description: A first-person perspective mystery puzzle-solving game where players immerse themselves in the role of characters involved in each episode's abnormal event to uncover the truth. The plan is to release 2 episodes per month, totaling 6 episodes per season.

name: Silent Cause
description: Single-player mysterious horror where you are trying to find out what happened to the family. While police found no cause from outside or from within the family. While case has been closed it started drawing all sorts of people from ghost hunters to private investigators, you are one of them.

name: Discarnate: Locust
description: You are tasked by The Collector to find a painting that has been locked away in the depths of an abandoned house. The Collector does not care how you find it, he cares about results and confidentiality. DO NOT attract unwanted attention, DO NOT fail him. Good Luck.

name: Fusion Fling
description: You are contracted by Blue Billy Bear to create fusions of different items, and to manage the sizes of them in this puzzle adventure to prevent overflow! Strategically match, fling, and fuse many creative fusions to gain more score. Challenge yourself using new fusions to conquer the leaderboard.

name: Raiders of Treasure Island
description: This is a multiplayer action-competitive game where you use mystical powers to become the ruler of the world! Warriors, gunmen, wizards... Dig up treasures buried deep underground. If you can make it out alive, they will all be yours. Gather your friends and join together in a hunting team.

name: Nova Core Chaos
description: NOVA CORE CHAOS is a chaotic co-op cooking game for one to five players. Play as one of five unique classes and follow the recipes to make energy cores. Give these to your customers to help them evolve into Novas!

name: Connor
description: Immerse yourself in 'Connor,' a VR shooter blending action, driving, and platforming. As agent Connor. Get ready for a heart-pounding adventure a seasoned agent propelled into a high-stakes mission when his wife is abducted by the Hive, a shadowy rival organization hell-bent on reshaping the world.

name: Somniata
description: Uncover the mystery—turned nightmare—of a missing family in rural Massachusetts. A lone detective must survive the horror unleashed upon a family of four.

name: Wild West Saloon
description: Howdy partner! In Wild West Saloon you manage and maintain your own saloon. Serve drinks, cook food, clean tables and most importantly keep your customers happy.

name: Sixty Four
description: Dive into the world of Sixty Four, where you transform simple machines into a thriving factory. Each advancement brings new challenges and a deeper understanding of an extraordinary universe.

name: Heartshot
description: Heartshot is a story driven VR espionage thriller where fast, chaotic gunplay meets retro-inspired cinematic environments. Armed with high-tech magnet gloves, seize weapons from fallen enemies and manipulate your environment as you make your way through a mysterious subterranean complex.

name: Yoko
description: Yoko offers a terrifying first-person psychological horror experience. Unravel the sinister mysteries of Saikominami, where spirits impede your exploration, immersing yourself in an immersive journey filled with suspense and horror.

name: The City Of Hope
description: A light city-building game that combines elements of card games and tower defense, where players must survive daily enemy attacks and gradually grow their strength to ultimately defeat powerful invaders.

name: The Unknown
description: A psychological horror, first person platformer. Solve puzzles and dodge deadly obstacles while being haunted by mikes inner demons.

name: Umbra Fields
description: A Black and White Choose Your Own Adventure game in the Open World of the Umbra Fields. Customize who you are between 13 distinct classes, choose what nation you wish to be in, and explore to your heart's content. Do quests, explore dungeons, fight, and discover your fate, and the fate of the world.

name: The will of space
description: You can freely assemble a spaceship and shoot with a double joystick at the top view angle in the survival Roguelike game! Explore science fiction space and build your strongest battleship!

name: Across Kiloparsecs
description: A science-fiction novel where you investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding the death of a close friend.

name: Who Did It?
description: Who Did It? Is a detective puzzle-game. Your job is to read the given case files to find out who the murderer is! Do you have what it takes to master all cases and close them all for good?

name: Behold Battle
description: Guess which army will win, and watch them fight for your amusement. Behold Battle is a simple auto battler, where you see heroes and monsters fight to the death in randomly generated battles.

name: Hazy Mind
description: You can't remember anything, and all you can see is HER. Delve into your story and uncover the truth behind what happened to you and your parents.

name: Bullet Bunny
description: Bullet Bunny is a twin-stick shooter with rogue-like elements. Fend off an onslaught of enemies, level up, and create unique builds every run while trying to survive 500 seconds!

name: The Thaumaturge
description: The Thaumaturge is a story-driven RPG with morally ambiguous choices, taking place in the culturally diverse world of early 20th century Warsaw. In this world, Salutors exist: esoteric beings that only Thaumaturges can truly perceive and use for their needs.

name: Mortal Glory 2
description: Manage a team of traveling gladiators in this turn-based fantasy roguelike. Find the best recruits, collect powerful loot and discover clever tactics on the battlefield. The tournament awaits those who desire Mortal Glory!

name: ServiceIT
description: If you love DIY and the world of technology isn't scary to you, don't wait and get at the helm of a recently acquired IT service! Repair equipment, configure it and develop the company. It's up to you to decide which jobs to do, who to hire and what you want your office to look like!

name: Lord Clicker
description: Lord Clicker gathers Clicker and Tower Defense in one game. Find a good balance between peasants, defenses and village.

name: Typing Hero
description: In a world filled with Zombies, a Spec Ops squad tries to survive and make their way through Hordes of Zombies to reach their final destination.

name: Master Arena: Phantom Edition Bundle
description: Introducing the "PHANTOM EDITION" bundle: 10 flashy and attention-grabbing skins guaranteed to make you stand out on every arena. Command attention with bold style.

name: Master Arena: Orange Neon Bundle
description: Explore the "ORANGE NEON" bundle featuring 10 dazzling skins. Dive into a futuristic urban aesthetic and be captivated by the glow of neon lights.

name: Master Arena: Inferno Edition Bundle
description: Introducing the "INFERNO EDITION" bundle: 10 skins boasting lava-inspired designs that ignite the battlefield. Command attention with their blazing style as you dominate every arena.

name: Leap In The Right Direction
description: Jump into 'Leap In The Right Direction,' a 2D platformer featuring the friendliest of frogs! Test your skills through the challenging level filled with tricky jumps and cunning obstacles. Navigate the vibrant world, overcome frustrations, and leap your way to victory.

name: Forgiveness RPG: The First Chapter - Part Two
description: Sin descripción

name: MGCM Combat Edition: DLC Char: Kamisaman (Isana Hakari)
description: This is "Kamisaman", an additional character of "MGCM Combat Edition". She can use either long-reaching normal moves or excellent projectiles to develop either defensive or offensive strategies. She is a hardworking girl who guides the main character and magical girls.

name: Night of the Dead: Ghost Pack
description: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. It's a brutal clothes that's great for instilling a sense of fear.

name: Night of the Dead: Civilian Combatant Pack
description: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. A tough outfit fit for a combatant.

name: Night of the Dead: Beginner Pack
description: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. It's a cute yellow outfit suitable for beginners.

name: Night of the Dead: Wood Carving Doll Pack
description: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. A Wood Carving Doll crafted by an artisan. Turn into a Wood Carving Doll and survive.

name: Night of the Dead: White Collar Civilian Pack
description: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. It's a neat suit, fit for a gentle survivor.

name: Giana Sisters
description: A 2D platformer, now on the Plus/4. Guide the Giana Sisters (Giana and Maria) through the levels, collecting diamonds and powerups, avoiding or killing enemies.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Bonsai
description: Try 24 detailed pictures with busy backgrounds, ideal for puzzling, full of Japanese spirit. Visit Tea Ceremony with Racoon Tanuki and view a lot beautiful Bonsai themed puzzles

name: Amazing Weekend: Search and Relax - Collector's Edition
description: Amazing Weekend: Search and Relax offers a variety of unique and compelling mini-games and hidden-object puzzles! Complete games to unlock new levels and explore interesting new locations where you'll go hiking, horseback riding, boating, and relaxing through a weekend of recreation!

name: Space Query
description: This simulation software brings the solar system to your fingertips, allowing you to explore the orbits of planets and witness the fascinating effects of introducing new cosmic objects like asteroids, extra suns, or even a black hole.

name: The Valley
description:
Find treasure fight monsters

Based on the type-in game from the April 1982 edition of Computing Today.

name: La Escalera
description:
Conversion of the classic Board game for ZX Spectrum 48 Kb.

Dice game.

The objective of the game is to reach square 100.

3 different boards to choose from.

Up to 4 players configurable to be controlled by people or the computer.

name: Amphibian Assault
description:
Where did things go wrong? You just went out to run some errands, and now look what happened. Lost in a swamp somewhere in the middle of the night.

A quite harrowing predicament to be in for a mere firefly. Uneasily you try to find your way back home, but it's no good.

Now your mind is playing tricks on you, you could have sworn something moved in the bushes ahead. From all around you, you start hearing ominous noises. Hungry eyes are leering at you in the dark. Then it begins! Frogs are attacking you from every direction! Escape is definitively out of the question. Being a firefly, you are able to defend yourself, But for how long?

Use your joystick in port II to take out the approaching frogs with fireballs. At first only a couple of them dare to come near. But in no time you are overwhelmed by entire swarms. Try to survive as long as possible, and take out as many frogs as you can, before you get swallowed.

Press any key to play again.

name: Risk: Global Domination - Dune Map Pack
description: Engage in strategic warfare across spice-rich deserts, Fremen sietches, and sprawling cities with these five limited release maps inspired by Dune: Part Two.

name: Evil Eyes
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Survivor
description: Space Survivor is a space-themed rogue-like game. Piloting and upgrading spaceships, recruiting crew members, recruit wingmen, constructing space station defense systems, and defending the space station.

name: Frozen Honey ASMR: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: DimCom
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzles of the Paladin
description: A free sokoban-like game with RPG items and Monsters, inspired by the game Dungeon and Puzzles by Nekolyst, made in PICO-8.

name: Elevator Experience
description: Embark on a one-of-a-kind journey of exploration in "Elevator Experience". Step into the elevator and prepare to be transported to a world of mysteries, where every floor holds a new adventure waiting to be unlocked.

name: Diamonds Collector
description: The pursuit of wealth - How it feels?

name: The Wandering Demon Blade
description: An quick paced action story game drowned out by silence. Cut through with the demon blade all the while surrounded by the quiet of the world. Experience the short story following death.

name: Crazy Goose Simulator
description: Unleash your inner mischief, experience chaos. Roam quirky environments, honk at humans, and wreak havoc. Solve puzzles and earn achievements.

name: Shines Over: The Damned
description:
Shines Over: The Damned will take you into a unique experimental horror experience in first person, where your senses will be tested and your reality questioned.

You have no name, no memory, no weapons. There are no friends to protect you. You are alone except for your faithful German Shepherd dog, who will guide you through this dark world and stay by your side.

Immerse yourself in a mysterious and terrifying walking simulator with your faithful companion, where jump scares, tension, and environmental puzzles surround you, and danger lies in wait.

Beware of the horrors that await you in Shines Over: The Damned. You have been warned…

name: Pight
description: Pight is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the Minecraft redstone system, in which we try to turn on the light block by using piston blocks and different block types.

name: Stellar Ghosts Settlers
description: Stellar Ghosts Settlers is a Sci Fi Fantasy 3rd person action shooter game. Chose amongst 6 of the playable characters to go through the missions or the arenas. Kill as many enemies as you can to earn even more credits to update your favorite character(s).

name: Somnicoda
description:
Somnicoda features an assortment of dreams for your perusal, from idyllic forest pathways to brooding cityscapes. Be wary however as these dreams may twist into nightmares...

Through the somnia you will come across keys and equipment to help you progress through the dreamscape and piece by piece bring an end to the turmoil within.

name: Rooster
description: A Game Boy / Browser game based on "Rooster" by Alice in Chains.

name: Faery: Swapped
description: When you discover that your family has been invaded by faeries, there is only one thing to do: take names, and kick...well, actually, just take names.

name: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 2: Red
description: After being taken prisoner by a Barbarian, you find yourself stuck in their camp. It's now time for you to try and find a way to escape. But, do you even want to escape?

name: Master Arena: Blue Neon Bundle
description: Explore the "BLUE NEON" bundle featuring 10 dazzling skins. Dive into a futuristic urban aesthetic and be captivated by the glow of neon lights.

name: Lonely Knight: Key Pass
description: Lonely Knight's Key Pass. The number of keys obtained daily is doubled.

name: Hunt Hide Run
description: A multiplayer 'Hide-and-seek' game with robots.

name: Droom
description: Droom is an adventure game of choice-based progression. The rooms are inhabited by a variety of alien life forms, and your choices are the key to success. As you progress through the levels, the threats in the rooms increase and the path becomes more difficult.

name: Simploe Tasks
description: 3D horizontal board shooting fixed viewing angle.

name: Pirate Pop Quest
description: "Pirate Pop Quest" sets sail on a thrilling arcade adventure that tests you with reflexes! Burst bubbles of vibrant colors as you navigate through challenging levels. Strategically match pairs to unleash cascading combos and unlock treasures hidden beneath the waves!

name: Taser Gun
description: Take out the enemies with the taser gun

name: Search All: Snakes
description: This is a game in the “search for objects” genre, in which you need to find all the snakes in a large location. Snakes will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to barely noticeable places

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Asian Food
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Krezber
description:
This is a new version of the classic arcade game Berzerk. In it you must avoid colliding with the walls, eliminate the enemies and leave the screen before Evil Otto appears and chases you.

This version has three game modes:

Original endless: It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies.

New mode endless: It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies you can use powerups.

New mode arcade : You must find the exit in each of the levels, you can use powerups an map.

name: Classified: France '44: Overlord Edition
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Bam Boom Blade
description: Bam Boom Blade is a physics-based 2D joust game for 2 players. Act as a wuxia riding on a bamboo, and try to defeat your rival using only 2 joysticks on your gamepad! Experience the original Chinese wuxia sword fight aesthetics in the bamboo grove.

name: Hidden Animals Find : Detective Neko
description: Neko and Watson follow several trails to solve the case. What awaits you at the end of the case as you search for the many animals and archenemies hidden within the various aspects of the city?

name: B1
description: You find yourself lost in a mysterious space in the underground shopping area of a certain building while trying to have lunch. Clear the game presented by someone and aim to escape from the eerie underground shopping area.

name: The Nom: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chrono Recorder
description: "ChronoRecorder" is a 3D puzzle game. Players can manipulate time and gravity. And you have to use that ability to solve problems. You might think this game is difficult if you don't use your brain.

name: Sex Campus
description: Welcome to the exciting world of SEX Campus, where freshman Nick embarks on an incredible journey through real student life. But in this college, every day is a new stage in the game 'Hot Pie,' where real-life quests are intertwined with fun and intriguing tasks.

name: The Witch Veils: The Mansion
description: When two witches and an apprentice are kidnapped in a mansion, only Star, the apprentice, can save them and uncover what is happening.

name: Three Kingdoms Battle Chess
description: This is a game that combines the style of the Three Kingdoms and Hearthstone Tavern Battle Chess. It has six game modes, over 700 generals, over 100 bonds, over 300 skills, over 80 treasures, troops, formations, items, and operations. It is a must-have for fans of the Three Kingdoms.

name: Buggy Race: Racing Master
description: Get ready for intense buggy races packed with action and excitement!

name: Gravityscape DX
description: Master the Cosmic Challenge: Can you escape the extraterrestrial onslaught?

name: Pool Together 2
description: Leave it all behind, kick back, and chill in Pool Together 2!

name: Ace Pilot Pacific
description: Ace Pilot Pacific is a top view air combat game. The action takes place during the WW2 Pacific war. Fly in 6 different planes against the Japanese. Dog fight with the help of your wingmen and become an Ace.

name: Rust Rails
description: Rust Rails is a 2D roguelike platformer. You have to travel by train through randomly generated locations, collect resources, craft equipment, and fight enemies. On your journey you will be helped by a mysterious robot and other inhabitants of this world.

name: The Secret of Varonis
description: An indie Gameboy-style RPG. Build a party from four unique races and unravel the mystery of Varonis through challenging old-school turn-based combat.

name: Microcosmum 2
description: A relaxing strategy game featuring unconventional gameplay. Your objectives include development, evolution, border expansion and protection of your hive.

name: Exit: A Biodelic Adventure
description: In the world of excessive biotechnologies, an epidemic of neural networks is ravaging the human race, enslaving people to the mysterious Worm. Who are you: a fighter of the infection, or a hunter of new prey?

name: Intra
description:
Finally towers fall in a tower defense game.
Intra-Tower Defense presents its player with vast strategy elements.

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Satoru Gojo Backshot Simulator
description: Gojo sensei is on a mission to become the strongest sorcerer in history. Press the buttons to give people backshots and don't run out of cursed energy. Try and get a mad high score.

name: Jaw Evolution
description: Evolve your jaw by tapping the screen and improve your looksmax to be the best.

name: War Thunder: Ancient Tank Bundle
Shadows of Progakko: Kuro
description: Progakkos were used to protect young people after a disease called "Blackout" emerged in a near-war situation between two countries. Adam starts living in Progakko, but doesn't trust the people around him, until he meets a girl who changes his life.

name: Moon River
description: Moon River is an atmospheric experience with very light narrative and gameplay elements. You'll explore different areas of Elapse Island, searching for ways to dispel dark shadows that block your path along the river. This is not intended to be thrilling or challenging, but rather to evoke emotions through the colors and sounds of this environment.

name: Remote Island
description: Remote Island is a sandbox game where you play as a man who has just crashed on a mysterious island occupied by other survivors. Will you find a way to leave, or will you enjoy yourself and stay ?

name: Liquidum: Mirrors
description: A level pack with 8 levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: One Lie
description: One Lie is a choice-driven adult visual novel about a young man not having the best start to his adulthood. His best friend betrays him and he decides to start his life somewhere else. Will he find peace, love and new friendships? Of course, he will. With whom? That's up to you.

name: Brushwood Saga
description: A simple adventure made in RPG Maker MV featuring turn-based combat, unique player characters, and plenty of dungeon crawling in a light-hearted adventure that steadily takes darker turns.

name: Cuckold's Gym
description: Unveil a tale brimming with secrets and hidden desires in "Cuckold's Gym" – a visual novel where every choice you make shapes the outcome.

name: Zombies & Love
description: Immerse yourself in the adult FPS shooter game "Zombies & Love", where sensuality meets horror. Go through explicit scenes and crowds of zombies in a world of apocalypse. Help Ted and Vera to survive in this dead world.

name: Dungeon Chamber: Rogue
description: Rogue class hero. Rogue has a crossbow, with freezing arrows, as his main weapon and the difficulty is moderate.

name: Dungeon Chamber
description: Dungeon Chamber is an action game, with an isometric view and character evolution. Three playable classes, MAGE, BARBARIAN and ROGUE(DLC). Acquire exclusive powers and adventure through 10 chambers for each hero. Unique ranking system for each chamber and hero.

name: Parts Unknown 2024
description: Parts Unknown is an online multiplayer fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting platformers with a unique twist.

name: Assassins Unleashed: The Apocalypse
description: Assassins Unleashed is an in development missions based game that requires some thinking and planning to take out your opponents, from hacking turrets, to more traditional methods such as pistols, each target is a different challenge.

name: Nori Danshi!!
description: "Wound up? By any nori but me." A thrilling school life with 4 good-looking nori! Which "nori" will you "omusubi" with ......?

name: Dot Hop
description: Dot Hop is a grid-based connect-the-dots game with deceptively challenging puzzles. Find a path from start to end without leaving any dots behind.

name: County Courier
description: Drive around town to deliver the packages loaded in your truck! Earn a paycheck to pay for gas and truck upgrades!

name: Train Simulator: China Railways HXD1
description: Discover ‘Harmony' with the China Railways HXD1, a new Chinese electric locomotive from Just Trains.

name: Power Fantasy: Kaze the Samurai
description: Kaze the Samurai, adorned in crimson armor, embodied the ancient code of the warrior with unparalleled swiftness and precision. Raised in the shadow of cherry blossoms, he honed his skills under the tutelage of masters, blending speed with deadly precision in each strike.

name: OverDrift Festival: Exclusive Cars Pack #2
description: This pack includes 10(!) EXCLUSIVE cars with unique visual design and technically upgraded to SPORT level! Attention: these cars can only be obtained by purchasing this DLC. These cars cannot be obtained by any other means in the game. The cars in this DLC are completely unique and exclusive.

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991: Play for USA
description: DLS makes it possible to play for USA

name: Street Fighting Simulator
description: Some strange guys from the next street came to your neighborhood, kick them out.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Agricultural Machinery
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Gloomgeons
description: Gloomgeons is a retro style 3D first person perspective game that combines the nostalgia of legend FPS games with the dungeons exploration. Step into a mysterious world of skeletons, wizards and golems.

name: Slot Advanture
description: Are you lucky or bad? 2D turn-based action adventure game. Defeat the monster with the hit rate you get by turning the slot. You can also get the character's stat, various items, and good ability buffs all at random. Trust your luck and go on an adventure rather than a high-level strategy.

name: Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother
description: Mrs. Chen is asked to pick up some documents; these documents reside at the University of Tokyo where she used to work. Upon her picking up these documents, she engages with audio recordings and diary entries that tells her what exactly took place in the experimentation room.

name: Magic Seeker: A Mimic's Odyssey - Chapter 1
description: Welcome to world of "MAGIKA". A turn-based game, with an intriguing story filled with mimics, creatures who can be anything that is around you, so always be prepared for a fight!

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Personal Boards 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Spin the Lighthouse
description: Spin the Lighthouse offers a serene and meditative escape, inviting players to embark on a journey of relaxation. With a focus on simplicity and peaceful interactions, this game is designed for individuals of all ages who seek a moment of tranquility after a hectic day. Spin and unwind – "Spin the Lighthouse" is your ticket to a peaceful and rejuvenating gaming experience. Find your calm, one rotation at a time.

name: Sippy Disco: Light Up The Dance Floor
description: Light up the dance floor in this cozy puzzle game! Sippy the unicorn must step on every square in the fewest possible moves to make the dance floor light up. Partner with Parrots on skates and disco balls to brighten everyone’s day!

name: Dino Park
description: Dino Park is a cozy idle game about collecting dinosaurs! Watch your dinosaurs level up in real time, earning more money for your park. Create the perfect environment for your dinosaurs to increase the chance of discovering super rare variants! Can you collect them all?

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Retro Revival
description: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Retro style tables with gameplay inspired by EMs of the past.

name: Fantasy Tower Defense Ultimate
description: Fantasy Tower Defense Ultimate - an exhilarating game where players will immerse themselves in a world of adventure, filled with mysteries and dangers.

name: Hexa Puzzle Block
description: Heхa Puzzle Block is an engaging puzzle that will impress all lovers of logic games and brain teasers!

name: My Life as a Cat
description:
"My life as a cat" is a relaxing, slow-paced visual novel about longing for something different than the modern society and searching back to nature. It has AI-generated oil paintings to illustrate the fully voiced and texted story as you progress through it according to your choices.

Will you have what it takes to survive out in the wilderness, or will you steer towards a not-so-favorable ending?

name: Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance + Kaiju Wars - Fight Monsters Bundle
description: Fight with monsters from Kaiju movies or real monsters of WW2 - Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance + Kaiju Wars

name: Jigsaw Zoo
description: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of funny animals in the zoo

name: Jigsaw Kids 1
description: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of kids going on incredible adventures like walking on the moon, flying spaceships or riding dragons!

name: Kour.io
