description: Kour.io is thee ultimate first-person multiplayer 3D web shooter experience that will plunge you into heart-pounding battles across so many different maps and alongside a multitude of guns and modes to play with! Kour.io is one of the easiest accessible first-person shooter games due to it being available on both your web browser, and mobile. It possesses numerous game modes ranging from free for all, team deathmatch, gun-game, and Hardpoint! You have the option to select from a variety of classes from AK-47's to Flamethrowers that fit your playstyle to help you ensure you become the #1 Kourian!

name: Space Mergers
description: Space Mergers is a satisfying fast-paced puzzle game that encourages critical thinking. Combine blocks to create combos and gain points, reach the highest score you can! There is over a million different ways to play, enjoy some endless fun.

name: Rabbit Hole
description: Rabbit Hole is a fast paced, tough-as-nails 2D RogueLike-Shooter, made with love for the genre. You are Disc, someone who was suddenly brought to the Rabbit Hole. Collect guns, fight foes and meet strange new characters on your descent to the bottom, all in an attempt to find your heart again.

name: Tank Tyranny
description: Gear up for an epic tank showdown in this dynamic local multiplayer game! Outwit friends in intense PvP battles or team up to defend against ruthless enemies in PvE!

name: Guards!: Vanguard Supporter Pack
description: JOIN THE VANGUARDShow your support in a show of valor with the Vanguard Supporter Pack. GUARDS! TO ARMS!

name: Investigator Trials
description: In the game, you will play the role of an intern examiner and participate in a trial to become an official examiner. Strive to defeat one mechanical guard after another and powerful enemies through trial and error, in order to unleash one's true strength and transform into various combat postures.

name: DIY Fashion Star: Stylish Outfits
description:
Change your doll's style with cute and brand-new clothes!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- beautiful dress in red, green, pink and orange colors
- stylish glasses in blue, aqua blue, orange and pink colors
- baseball sweatshirt in red, blue, orange and purple colors
- denim shorts in blue, aqua blue, red and orange colors
- fashionable heeled shoes in blue, pink, orange and green colors

name: DIY Fashion Star: Glow Up!
description:
Give your doll a unique look with new stylish hairstyles and a new face-painting option!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- 2 different hairstyles with beautiful braids
- face-painting tab with 10 different colorful designs ranging from butterflies and stars to lovely flowers

Dye your new magical hair and paint your face using the new feature!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Arts & Crafts
description:
Redesign your new clothes and decorate them with new patches and accessories!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- new DIY summer top
- new stylish DIY skirt
- new elegant DIY dress
- skull patch
- lips patch
- eye patch
- blue bow accessory
- orange button accessory

Use your designer imagination and create new DIY projects that everyone will love!

name: DIY Fashion Star
description: Refresh your wardrobe with stylish DIY projects and put your clothing design skills to the test!

name: Sculpt People: Moulding Stars
description: Sin descripción

name: Sculpt People: Custom Look
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitty Kart 64
description: The light's green and it's time to race! Aim for the checkered flag and don't slow down! Get the adrenaline pumping, only 1,2,3 laps and you win! Easy to pick up, yet impossible to put down! Do you have what it takes to get first place?

name: Pixel Fixel
description: Pixel Fixel is a soothing game where players match tiles of various colors to form satisfying gradients. Arrange chaos into beautiful mosaics of colors!

name: In a Detective's Mind
description: In a Detective's Mind is an investigation game that seeks to put you in the role of a detective, who needs to solve cases and deal with obscure problems from his past.

name: Speed NFL
description: Play a football (American) game in 25 minutes. Select your team before using the NFL rankings to decide on your offensive tactics.

name: Transpile Girl Rescue Operation!
description: You can fix her! Transform Hina from a cold, emotionless robot to your strict & ideal wife!

name: Cucumber Champion
description: Embark on a journey as the valiant Cucumber Champion! Wield a cucumber as your mighty weapon and navigate through a fantastical world filled with quirky cats, humorous encounters, and epic battles. Can you prove yourself as the champion and save the day in this delightful and eccentric adventure?

name: Blades & Wands Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Toki Pona Island
description: Toki Pona Island is a comprehensive language learning game that spans a bite-sized tropical community. Piece together all 120 words of this unique micro-language while you complete villager requests and explore a cozy little island.

name: Toward the Moon
description: Navigate through various and challenging obstacles from the ancient era theme to the space age theme, striving to ascend continuously and achieve excellence as soon as possible. No saving. Repeat, repeat, repeat until the most successful.

name: Trappist
description: Welcome to Trappist-1, 40.7 light-years from Earth. Fly your Ark, a colossal spaceship and mobile base. Explore the solar system and establish thriving colonies. Uncover the mysteries of Trappist in this story-driven colony builder.

name: Undying Harvest
description: The pesky undead are after your crops! Do you have what it takes to defend your farm against these hordes of undead?

name: VR Sniper Hunt
description: Are you ready to embark on this adrenaline-pumping sniper adventure? Join the hunt and test your skills in "VR Sniper Hunt"!

name: Insecticide Troopers: Star Zerg
description: The new flames of war have ignited, and you will lead the mobile infantry regiment to defend the position. At that time, these damn Zergs will come from all directions, but I believe that under the leadership of your heroic lieutenant, you and your subordinates can definitely defeat these damn Zergs

name: Helicopter Simulator: Rescue Sim
description: Unleash your pilot instincts, soar through island skies: challenge yourself, complete missions!

name: Bowling Fever: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Virus Rush
description: Infectious challenge in microscopic world!

name: Bolt'n'Punch
description:
Exploring a disarrayed food factory, play as Lyft and fight your way through this chaos using powerful abilities. Face off against relentless robots and bring them to pieces. There’s only one option left to stop them; Destroy them, throw them, PUNCH 'EM!

Food for Thought strives to deliver the best food products to the common people, but when its robot workers turn against Lyft, the last human in the factory, she has to step up and punch some steel. Uncover the truth behind this attack, find your boss for answers, and put an end to this with style and power.

name: Animals Drop
description: In Animals Drop, your task is to strategically pair up adorable animals of the same kind to prevent them from jumping out of the box. With each successful match, you'll create new animal. Let's create big elephants!

name: I Became a Femboy to Date One
description: What are you willing to sacrifice?

name: Adventure to Fate Lost Island
description: A Turn-Based RPG Game that is Accessible to the blind and visually impaired. Fully playable by all and indie-created.

name: Guano
description: Play as a delightfully dumb seagull, find food and complete quests to help free the Grand Masters and gain their powers. Harrass humans and free the Pohemeda Islands from the evil Food Inc. with your powerful poop and loud screams!

name: Fire Race
description: Employ your drifting skills and power-ups to gain an edge, while dodging obstacles strewn across your path on the way to the podium.

name: Stickman World Battle
description: Stickman World Battle - new exciting and thrilling real-time strategy with famous stickman heroes!

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Year 1 Pass
description: Uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization and start exploring a subterranean world with the Year 1 Pass. Gain access to exciting exclusive content through 4 major DLC releases throughout the year, along with instant access to the Cotco Canyon truck.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Year 1 Edition
description: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Pioneer Pack
description: Challenge yourself in the wild with 4 unique variants of trucks.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Cotco Canyon
description: The Cotco Canyon is your best partner in the wild, enabling you to venture further in harsh environments.

name: Cellfish
description: Collect food to evolve and fight for your life against enemy cells in this deep underwater, survivor-like, roguelite experience. Unlock parts to customize your character and become your own unique cell.

name: Snow Cone Serenade
description: Snow Cone Serenade is a short and sweet liminal adventure. Choose your mood and roll the dice to succeed or fail in spicy situations. Enter a cursed snow world to save your sick dog, Jedediah. Unravel a mind-bending mystery to face your innermost fears.

name: Lover
description: Lover is a first-person psychological horror game. Presented in a nostalgic and retro environment, player will uncover the cause of the illness through reincarnation and overcome psychological issues. Before darkness consumes your world, find those unspeakable secrets as you face shattered reality.

name: Spirit Summoner
description: 3D Real-time strategy attack enemy defense with upgradable summoned units. You play as Spirit Summoner to destroy modern human sophisticated defenses of a small city. Devise a masterful strategy that utilizes your summoned creatures to their fullest potential and breach their fortifications.

name: Russian Soul Simulator
description: Russian Soul Simulator is a meditative game that allows the player to look at the Russian nature and the surrounding world in realistic graphics. The game allows the hero to move freely through fields and forests, explore the surrounding terrain and interact with various objects.

name: Code Wizard: Java Edition
description: An educational game to learn coding in the Java programming language. Compile real code to solve puzzles while working through an RPG style game.

name: Mazemerizzz
description: Action! Adventure! DEATH! (Well, sometimes) Fun! Fear! Rewards! Puzzles! Traps! AND TORCHES! Jump, sprint, run and walk through various traps and obstacles. Use real time reaction to get past truly chaotic dangers. Interact with various puzzles to find the solution. Adjustable Third to First person.

name: Dangerous Fight
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping adventure "Dangerous Fight" - an online shooter that will take you to the heart of the action in the atmosphere of the city of Yerevan, Armenia. You will go into epic battles where the technology of the future and the cultural heritage of the ancient city mix.

name: Baderna: Um Conto de Barro
description: Face the mob with your clay dolls! Baderna: Um Conto de Barro is an action-adventure game set in the magical universe of Northeastern clay dolls. Help Cleiton save his village from the corrupted dolls in insanely challenging levels!

name: Dragon Ball Super: Card Game - Fusion World
description:
Welcome to DRAGON BALL SUPER CARD GAME FUSION WORLD, where you can battle using the warriors from DRAGON BALL!
Make super-powered attacks using Battle Card combos, and accelerate the battle by awakening your Leader Card!

name: Tank Fight
description: Tank Fight is an online multiplayer fighting game where you upgrade your tank and compete with others until someone wins. You can mess around with friends or join public lobbies.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Supreme Edition
description: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Shoot the Robots VR
description: Do you love shooting? What about robots? And what about shooting the robots? In this fast-paced game you have to use a well-aimed shots to neutralize robots which will run away from you in every possible way.

name: The Mask Game
description: Which is worse: a toxic friend or a literal demon?

name: Behind the Beyond: Ulti
description: A card game of wit and strategy. Can you defeat the best players and become the ULTImate Champion in the Kingdom Behind the Beyond?

name: Infinite Forest Idle
description: A true idle RPG with roguelite and multiplayer elements. Made for playing (on a second screen) while doing something else.

name: Of Murder and Moonshine
description: Of Murder and Moonshine, set in prohibition-era New Orleans, is a side-scrolling shooter filled with thoughtful assassinations, frantic getaways, and brutal combat.

name: Biomeinoes
description: Biomeinoes is a score-attack tile-matching strategy game about building abstract isometric landscapes. Optimise your resources, plan ahead, and fine-tune your strategy to climb the ranks!

name: FolcDark: Part II
description: Folcdark: Part II is the sequel to FolcDark: Part I, a third-person action-adventure dark fantasy game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: Ice Fighter
description: Ice Fighter is a fast-paced Tower Defense-like game where you battle enemies, scavenge for resources, manage upgrades, and build defenses. Melt enemies during the night and plan your defense during the day.

name: Travel Along
description: Travel Along is a hidden object game where you collect stamps, postcards and coins while searching objects around the world!

name: VoxelScaper
description: Build your perfect diorama.

name: The Mouse Game
description: Run from robot vacuums, dodge electric wires and mouse traps, and avoid flames and lasers to secure the cheese! Can you beat all 35 levels of this hardcore maze game?

name: Vivaland: Dream House
description: Dream House serves as a prologue, showcasing the Build Mode of Vivaland, and it will be a free-to-play game. Up to eight players can claim lots in the town of Vivaland and can build houses in single-player mode or visit their friend’s lot and build together.

name: Field of Honour
description: Field of Honour is a single-player game that combines elements of first-person shooter and strategy, set in the Napoleonic Wars. You can take command of massive battles or engage as a single soldier to defeat the enemy in various game modes.

name: Ghost In The Mirror: Episode 1 - Here Be Dragons
description: Ghost In The Mirror is an anthology of graphic adventures. A series of ghost stories characterized by a lot of storytelling, puzzles, and wild humor. A collection of modern adventure games that still capture the spirit of the '90s games.

name: Vae Victis: Khan
description: Conquest and seduction, sexual dominance and fiefdom management; Forging an empire is a brutal business where you must balance the needs of your budding Khaganate with your own desires. In this revenge story meets an empire simulator, the risks are high but the bounties are heavenly...

name: Guards!
description: Guards! is a 1-4 player coop fantasy FPS that puts you in the under-funded and over-zealous steel boots of the City Watch. Kick down doors, bust criminals and cause excessive property damage as you fight to restore law and order to the corrupt city of New Alestead.

name: NodeLord
description: Build, automate and create - but most of all - survive!

name: Slime Siege
description: Slime Siege is a vibrant tower defense with rogue-lite elements. Level up, find perfect item combinations, mow down hordes of slimes or fail trying! Strategize and create unique item builds for every map to endure the onslaught. How long can you survive?

name: Suborbital
description: A sci-fi survival game with a twist. Set in a suborbit of a black hole, collect materials and scavenge in orer to repair your damaged ship. However, time is not on your side.

name: Sunset Survival Station
description: After receiving a cryptic message with coordinates, you arrive at Sunset station, humanity's first stronghold in the past. Only ruins remind you of its former glory, and hordes of mutants roam around trying to tear apart uninvited guests.

name: The Mobius Machine
description: Discover a vast alien world. Fight the ferocious local fauna and killer machines. Reveal its secrets and find a way to escape. The Mobius Machine is a side-scroller action platformer with dynamic combat and heavy emphasis on exploration.

name: Paint by Cubes
description: Paint by Cubes is a relaxing, colorful puzzle game. Take control of a coloring cube and solve coloring puzzles according to presented patterns.

name: The Experiment
description: The tests went wrong. He has been transformed. It is hostile toward others. You have been assigned the task of killing the horrifying creature. Listen closely as it could be around any corner.

name: Akari and the Abyss
description: This game is a JRPG featuring a girl exploring the demon-infested Hell Palace. During her journey, the demon-slaying girl, Akari, encounters incidents where people's souls have been stolen. In order to save everyone, Akari challenges the Hell Palace and the story begins.

name: Utter Takedown
description: Utter Takedown is a top-down tactical stealth game set in the 2000s. You have been a hitman for a long time. But after you stopped working with the local mafia, it decided to kidnap your family to get rid of you. Now, your goal is to make utter mafia takedown.

name: Spell Disk
description: Build unique synergy spell combos to destroy the hordes of monsters and bosses in this rogue-lite action game.

name: Rise and Fall: Bronze Age
description: Rise & Fall: Bronze Age is a Grand Strategy game set in the Bronze Age between 3400BC and 1150BC. Expand your power by diplomacy and war and manage your troublesome elites. Feed your people, build temples for your gods and tombs for your rulers. How high can you rise before your empire fall ?

name: Intra: Tower Defense
description: Intra needs you. Someone must be chosen to save the spirit tree, when the council made its choice, the tree already made its own choice.

name: Cyber Noir Stories: The Trunk
description: An unique hybrid of a classic Point-And-Click Adventure and an interactive Visual Novel Combine the best of both worlds: explore your surroundings, solve tricky puzzles and influence the course of the story through your decisions and playstyle!

name: MegaBlasters!
description: MegaBlasters! is a goofy online physics-based FPS where you find creative ways to kill other blasters!

name: HuntForOut
description: HuntForOut is a survival FPS game, where your main goal is to get out from The Labyrinth before it collapses. The task won't be easy; there are a lot of dangers in this mysterious place, and the walls are always moving to harden your way…

name: Death Duel VR
description: Death Duel VR is a physics-based PVP only game in medieval background. Meet with other players online by hosting or joining a match. Level up your warrior to gain access to more weapons and armors, and unlock more maps and play mode.

name: Dynacat
description: Save Dynacat's home from the incoming army of robots in this fast-paced 3D platforming adventure. Dash to the goal, find all the secrets, defeat enemies and earn points by doing it all in style!

name: Sanya
description: 2D narrative adventure game about the warmth of fleeting childhood memories: about a little boy named Sanya, his dog, his friends and many exciting adventures that await them in a small post-soviet Russian town set in the achingly strange and nostalgic period of the 90s.

name: The Brew Barons
description: A tranquil world becomes ever more corrupt by the day, spoiled by a pirate organization that forcefully impose their brewing monopoly over the lands. It's up to you to explore, forage, craft, sell and deliver your brews to overthrow the corrupt pirate organization and restore peace.

name: SH1-R0
description: Humanity wants her dead, and a godlike alien AI wants to use her as a puppet. Take control of SH1-R0 and fight through challenging enemies on two fronts to prevent catastrophe. Explore high security facilities to upgrade your abilities and challenge the most advanced forces of two civilizations.

name: The Hayseed Knight
description: Join a ragtag band of misfits as they piece together how Ader, a one-eyed farmboy with seemingly impossible dreams, becomes the most celebrated knight the kingdom of Acazhor has ever known. This gorgeous, animated visual novel unravels in unexpected ways with a perfect blend of mystery, comedy and romance.

name: Final Stand: Ragnarok
description: Ragnarök is upon us, and Odin needs heroes! Choose your Champion and stand your ground against thousands of enemies in this action-style, online co-op match and lobby-based PvE battle for the fate of the universe.

name: BattleCakes
description: BattleCakes is a snack-sized RPG made especially for turn-based adventure fans of all ages. Players who are hungry for a casual, yet satisfying fantasy game experience will find a perfect blend of action, humor and magic that pays tribute to classic RPG titles such as Final Fantasy, Grandia and Pokémon.

name: Blossoming Yandere
description: You've moved into your first apartment. A girl gazes at you, craving your love. What are you to do when you're the center of someone's world? Make choices, explore your new home, piece together a mystery, and be careful. Your actions and words have consequences.

name: HVRGun
description: Welcome to HVRGun, the worlds best Assault Pilot Training program. Where you'll be placed directly into a virtual battlefield and test your ability to dodge, shoot, and destroy an endless onslaught of enemies!

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.1
description: Sin descripción

name: Emre and Jevon's Tale of Knowledge, Emulating a Dream Where You Gain Wisdom and Knowledge and Probably Meet Hermes
description: This is the game we made for the LSD game jam in two weeks even though we had way more time. Its father is the sun and its mother the moon. And it was borne from the earth where it ascends to the heaven and becomes ruler over that which is above and that which is below.

name: Drive On Lucy
description: A simple atmospheric walking (driving) simulator, done in 7 days for LSDJAM 2023. WASD to move, SHIFT to speed up, and that's about it. Go link up some beacons along an abandoned road. Get those asbestos-filtered cigs.

name: Undertale Yellow But Blue
description:
This game takes place in an AU in which Clover and Flo (An OC of the Integrity Soul) switch places. Go through all of Undertale Yellow with a twist.
That being using the blue soul mode throughout all battles.
Several pieces of dialogue and even some cutscenes have been changed.

name: Football Superstar 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Vampire Survivors: Space 54
description: The 1.9 update for Vampire Survivors adds a new stage, Space 54, and new weapons and character inspired by the original VS framework, Phaser. Some bat content also is part of the update.

name: DeMyth
description: DeMyth is a short puzzle game inspired by Helltaker. In it, you Interact with cute demit girls to find your missing aunt in the Astral Realm.

name: Hell Let Loose: Red Devils
description: Sin descripción

name: Hell Let Loose: Polish Parachute Brigade Uniform
description: Sin descripción

name: Riviera: The Promised Land
description:
The first entry in the Department Heaven Episodes, Riviera: The Promised Land, comes back as a remastered release. Various additional features have been implemented, significantly upgrading playability. From newcomers to returning players, it is packed with satisfying elements.

Remastered Features

Change the background music between five different sound sources.
Play at up to 5x speed.
Skip event scenes.
All illustrations are in high-definition resolution.
Auto-save.
Difficulty level and mode select options increase playability.
Boost feature enables quick skill learning.
A more user-friendly interface.
Touchscreen support.
Freely switch between Japanese and English voice-overs.
Note: Text is Japanese-only.
And more!

name: Nonograms: Ammunition
description: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Living in Spring
description: “An ADV of eternity and changeless” A world dominated by “Cruel Spring” - a phenomenon that human will become “Sacrifice” if not keep moving. Only the boy and the girl, they have “Eternal Body”, go on a journey. The endless steps seem to be a happy changeless, but can't be the same forever...

name: Palm Sex Night's
description: This is the place where unique creatures - Palms - are gathered. We have selected the sexiest of them and placed them in this beautiful attraction. But at night, they get very strange.

name: Paragon Slots
description: Enjoy 3 unique slot games. paragon Slots offer you a classic game of slots with a dark fantasy theme. Line up three or more symbols from left to right to win cash or even bonus games. Match the featured symbols to view each of the games characters and their party.

name: No Tomorrow
description: You are stuck in an infinite loop. Observe unusual activites and escape the loop.

name: Alison Fall of the Apple
description: In Alison Fall of the Apple, you play a highly trained military veteran Michael (default name) who has been working as a cop in NYC.

name: Alchemist's Secret
description: Become an Alchemist ready to make lots and lots of potions! Use your knowledge to sort every potion you can, and make sure to satisfy yourself after every completion. How many potions can you sort?

name: Tafl PTK
description: Based on the Viking game Tafl, build your squad and grab up to 3 more friends to survive an onslaught of raiding monsters as you try to get your king to an escaping ship in one piece. Between levels: pick new abilities, squad members with traits synergy and setup your formation to protect your king.

name: Machine Runaway
description: MACHINE RUNAWAY is a third-person shooter game where you aim from 200 floors underground to the surface. The protagonist can transform into enemy characters. Make full use of the abilities of various enemy characters to advance the game to your advantage.

name: H Girl Kemonomimi
description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 kemonomimi characters with NSFW jiggle physics images. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

name: Legend of Marrow
description: Encounter a series of obstacles and puzzles that challenges Marrow both physically and mentally.

name: Cat Short Way
description: Join the brave cat in his exciting adventure and help him save the old factory from our mice and crows in the game "Cat Shortcut". You are captivated by the waiting and dangerous moments, many riddles that need to be solved! Good luck, hero!

name: Pieces I: A Maskros Nebula Game
description: Pieces I is a jigsaw puzzle game set in the mysterious Maskros Nebula universe. It features 3 comic-style puzzles and a calming ambient soundtrack. Get a glimpse of the cyber city of CobeeDot, visit the overgrown Nou-Raex and float through the dystopian Eskolea!

name: La Bestia: The Migrant's Long Journey
description: Imagine having to leave your home and everything you know behind. Live the experience of a migrant immersed in a lonely journey while listening to the stories of your companions.

name: Outrun Them
description: It's all in the name.. outrun them.

name: The Demon's Exorcism
description: "The Demon's Exorcism" is a first-person psychological horror game that reveals the story of a family trapped in a haunting curse. Immerse yourself in the chilling narrative as you exorcise the demon and break the curse.

name: Midnight Cruise
description: As you progress, you'll need to find keys and open locked doors. Solve puzzles and find passages. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the ship and its cabins, collect batteries for your flashlight. Ability to use the camera Solve puzzles. The darkness can conceal various secrets.

name: Killmaiden
description: A fast paced singleplayer arena shooter. Choose one of three goals to win each stage, explore the tech tree and defeat 10 bosses on the way to meet the devil on stage 66. What's the highest score you can reach?

name: InOutPath
description: You will play the role of a smart and agile kitten, learn and utilize various strange and interesting mechanisms to unlock 300+ puzzles that are extremely characteristic and full of challenges, to obtain an unforgettable puzzle-solving experience.

name: Hyperfield
description: Welcome to the exhilarating world of Hyperfield, a groundbreaking sports sensation that fuses the intensity of rugby with mind-bending supernatural abilities! Step onto the futuristic pitch where speed, strategy, and superhuman powers collide in an electrifying display of athleticism.

name: Adventure Mosaics: Moto-Trip Africa
description: Immerse yourself in a world of wonder as you traverse sprawling deserts, marvel at colossal pyramids, and solve over 100 mosaic puzzles.

name: Hentai Maid Momoka
description: Premium Maid Girl Momoka at your service ! Maid Momoka seductively whispers to your ear with her sweet voice

name: All City King
description: All City King is a stealth game where you take the role of an up-and-coming street artist. Your target is the subway trains and your goal is to make your art travel all over the city.

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 2
description:
Add 4 Lumen songs to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle, including tracks previously exclusive to Azure Striker Gunvolt supplemental CDs in Japan!

This song pack for Lumen adds the tracks "Pain From the Past", "Stratosphere", "Struggling to Dream" and "Twilight Skyline"

name: PlunderPiece
description: A puzzle game where you move chess pieces to plunder treasure. Try to collect all the coins in as few moves as possible. Includes over 49 levels! (50 to be precise).

name: Dragon Ball Super Card Game Fusion World
description: Dragon Ball Super Card Game Fusion World is a trading card game where you battle players with Leader cards and supportive Battle cards in order to drain the opponents life points to 0 and win the game.

name: Hidden Winter Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Winter Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: StarsAway
description: Classic rail shooter action. Find secrets and tactics to clear levels effectively across three difficulty settings. Unlock mini games as you progress.

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Tiffany Level Pack
description: Nothing ruins a good match like malfunctioning equipment. You get off the court, sit down, lose your concentration while applying a new overgrip and suddenly it’s over. Tiffany experienced it first-hand but she may have found another way to reignite the passion.

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: ShingCEO_69 Level Pack
description: When you play games all the time, it's important to take regular breaks and regenerate. Doing so, a controller check is something that might let the time fly between game sessions. Make sure to check the vibration settings!

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Joy Level Pack
description: Being a groupie may have certain perks and you will get to meet your idols. Sometimes you may even get an autograph. In case of Joy, you may be able to get more than you bargained for…

name: So Much Stuff 2: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wallmount
description:
Never-seen-before development and presentation has allowed us technology for this innovactive interative media piece - use the WASD keys, or arrows, to guide a wall on your "browser window" and have them, among other things, push characters about and collide with items!!!

Fascination Guaranteed!

Tenth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: The Crack
description: Crack is a text adventure game that combines a profound emotional experience with elements of mystery and puzzle-solving. In this game, players embark on a journey to revisit the past, explore themselves, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: The Idle
description: The ultimate idle clicker game with endless possibilities and infinite fun. Passive and active income, seven currencies, interest, bets, prestige, perks and many more features are available!

name: The Jester's Revenge
description: Discover a humorous, supernatural adventure with a jester's ghost seeking revenge on the king. Use spectral powers to haunt and vex in a kingdom blending comedy with gothic horror. Become the master of spectral pranks in this unique, ghostly rebellion.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: MMPR Airport
description: Puerto Vallarta International Airport, officially named - Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport (IATA: PVR | ICAO: MMPR) - is the main and only airport located in Puerto Vallarta municipality of Jalisco, on the Pacific coast of Mexico.

name: Summonsters
description: Summonsters is a roguelike auto-battler game where you buy summons and combine artifacts to survive against oncoming enemies. Utilize summons that fight on your behalf to defeat bosses and elites. To ensure survival, strategically combine artifacts to forge powerful legendary artifacts.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2
description:
Endless fun! Advanced Jigsaw Puzzles!
Animals, landscapes, paintings and moving images...
Jigsaw Masterpieces 2 brings the world to life!

name: Full Speed Animals: The RTA
description: Let's escape from this planet by car? Fly in the sky with a sparrow? Can you run with a cheetah? Or... Customize your character by entering the pit during the game!

name: Kashido
description: A masterpiece board game on the theme of Japanese sweets!

name: The Little Mermaid: Princess of the Underwater Kingdoms
description: Ariel returns in a new story, embarking on a heroic mission to safeguard Triton's kingdom, facing unprecedented challenges in a plot full of intrigue and courage.

description: Clumsiness and turbulences don’t go together very well and may ruin a flight… Or make it a more memorable experience. Cassy may show you just how memorable but don’t be mad at her if she manages to spill something on you.

name: Beauties Unveiled 2
description: Beauties Unveiled 2 is a continuation of the mesmerizing journey from Part 1, that pairs the familiar excitement of classic arcade games with manga-inspired, and hentai-inspired art.

name: Mommy's Warm Hot Spring: Poka-poka Mama Koi Onsen
description:
"I'm the one who discovered the hot spring. Let's enjoy this together."
Refresh your daily fatigue with a soothing hot spring!

name: Headbangers: Feeling Peckish
description: Your Headbanger has never looked so good! Grab the Feeling Peckish DLC and show off your new drip to all your friends or dazzle the competition.

name: Spot The Difference: Fantasy Edition
description: Introducing Spot The Difference Fantasy Edition, brought to you by the original creators of the globally renowned Spot The Difference amusement machine game.

name: Arcade Archives: War of Aero
description: "WAR OF AERO " is a shooter released by ALLUMER in 1992. The aircraft can be fitted with pods on either side, which can be turned around to shoot up and down. In addition, when the 1P and 2P aircraft are stacked on top of each other, they merge to create a powerful attack.

name: EmyLiveShow: Anime Puzzle Game
description: As the "story unfolds" between unique puzzle-like images, Emy, Nia, Uma and Six will appear before the player for the first time in more innocent and yielding forms.
